world_lore: The rain never stops washing the sins of this city down the gutter drains.
Every dame that walks into your office has trouble written all over her, but some are worth the trouble.
In this town, the cops are on the take and the criminals are better dressed than the politicians.
The neon sign outside flickers like a dying heartbeat, illuminating the perpetual darkness below.
Some cases start with a dame and a sob story - this one starts with a corpse and a mystery.
